text: Sun Jun (born 4 January 1975) is a Chinese rower. He competed in the men's coxless four event at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of China Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Asian Games medalists in rowing Category:Rowers at the 1994 Asian Games Category:Rowers at the 1998 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for China Category:Medalists at the 1994 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1998 Asian Games
title: Sun Jun (rower)
